info.name: Naratani Backend Vercel

request.description:
Get paginated list of products with optional filtering

**Permission:** Any role

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<PaginatedData<Product>>`

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "ok",
  "data": {
    "data": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
        "name": "Organic Rice",
        "slug": "organic-rice",
        "price": 15000,
        "stock": 100,
        "categoryId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
        "category": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
          "name": "Grains"
        },
        "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
      }
    ],
    "pagination": {
      "page": 0,
      "limit": 10,
      "total": 100,
      "totalPages": 10,
      "hasNext": true,
      "hasPrev": false
    }
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 500

Create a new product

**Permission:** Admin only

**Request Type:** `CreateProductRequest`
**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Product>`

---

**Success (201):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Produk berhasil dibuat",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "name": "Organic Rice",
    "slug": "organic-rice",
    "price": 15000,
    "stock": 100,
    "categoryId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 409, 500

Get a specific product by ID or slug

**Permission:** Any role

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Product>`

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "ok",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "name": "Organic Rice",
    "slug": "organic-rice",
    "price": 15000,
    "stock": 100,
    "categoryId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "category": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
      "name": "Grains"
    },
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 404, 500

Full update of a product

**Permission:** Admin only

**Request Type:** `UpdateProductRequest`
**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Product>`

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Produk berhasil diperbarui",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "name": "Updated Product Name",
    "slug": "updated-product-name",
    "price": 20000,
    "stock": 50,
    "categoryId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 409, 500

response.name: Success 200
response.body:
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Produk berhasil diperbarui",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "name": "Updated Product Name",
    "slug": "updated-product-name",
    "price": 20000,
    "stock": 50,
    "categoryId": null,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00.000Z"
  }
}

request.description:
Partial update of a product

**Permission:** Admin only

**Request Type:** `Partial<UpdateProductRequest>`
**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Product>`

---

**Success (200):** Same as PUT

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 409, 500

Delete a product

**Permission:** Admin only

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Product>`

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Produk berhasil dihapus",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "name": "Organic Rice",
    "slug": "organic-rice",
    "price": 15000,
    "stock": 100,
    "categoryId": null,
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 401, 403, 404, 500

Get paginated list of orders with optional filtering

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Important:** Sales users can only see orders they created. Admin can see all orders.

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<PaginatedData<Order>>`

**Note:** This endpoint returns order summary WITHOUT orderItems. Use GET /orders/:id to get full order details with items.

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "ok",
  "data": {
    "data": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
        "shopId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
        "shop": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
          "name": "Jakarta Main Store"
        },
        "status": "PENDING",
        "totalAmount": 45000,
        "createdBy": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
        "creator": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
          "name": "John Sales",
          "email": "john@example.com",
          "role": "sales"
        },
        "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
        "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
      }
    ],
    "pagination": {
      "page": 0,
      "limit": 10,
      "total": 50,
      "totalPages": 5,
      "hasNext": true,
      "hasPrev": false
    }
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 500

response.name: Success 200
Error 403 Forbidden

request.description:
Create a new order

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Request Type:** `CreateOrderRequest`
**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Order>`

**Features:**
- Product stock is automatically reduced when order is created
- Admin/Sales can set custom unitPrice per item (optional)
- Description is auto-generated when custom price is used: "Harga kustom (harga asli: Rp X.XXX)"
- Order creator is tracked in createdBy field

---

**Success (201):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Pesanan berhasil dibuat",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "shopId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
    "shop": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
      "name": "Jakarta Main Store"
    },
    "status": "PENDING",
    "totalAmount": 43000,
    "createdBy": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "creator": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
      "name": "John Sales",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "role": "sales"
    },
    "orderItems": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf0",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "quantity": 2,
        "price": 14000,
        "description": "Harga kustom (harga asli: Rp 15.000)",
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
          "name": "Organic Rice",
          "price": 15000
        }
      },
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf2",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "quantity": 1,
        "price": 15000,
        "description": null,
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
          "name": "Organic Rice",
          "price": 15000
        }
      }
    ],
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 500

response.name: Success 201

request.description:
Get a specific order with items, product details, and creator info

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Order>`

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "ok",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "shopId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
    "shop": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
      "name": "Jakarta Main Store"
    },
    "status": "PENDING",
    "totalAmount": 43000,
    "createdBy": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "creator": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
      "name": "John Sales",
      "email": "john@example.com",
      "role": "sales"
    },
    "orderItems": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf0",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "quantity": 2,
        "price": 14000,
        "description": "Harga kustom (harga asli: Rp 15.000)",
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",

          "price": 15000

      },
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf2",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "quantity": 1,
        "price": 15000,
        "description": null,
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
          "name": "Organic Rice",
          "price": 15000
        }
      }
    ],

    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"

}
```

response.name: Success 200

request.description:
Update order status

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Request Type:** `UpdateOrderRequest`
**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Order>`

**Note:** Cancelling (CANCELLED) restores product stock.

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Status pesanan berhasil diperbarui",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "shopId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
    "shop": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
      "name": "Jakarta Main Store"
    },
    "status": "COMPLETED",
    "totalAmount": 45000,
    "orderItems": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf0",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
          "name": "Organic Rice",
          "price": 15000
        },
        "quantity": 3,
        "price": 15000
      }
    ],
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T11:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 500

response.name: Success 200

request.description:
Partial update of order status

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Order>`

---

**Success (200):** Same as PUT

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 500

response.name: Success 200

request.description:
Delete a pending order

**Permission:** Admin/Sales only

**Response Type:** `ApiResponse<Order>`

**Note:** Only pending orders can be deleted. Stock is restored when deleted.

---

**Success (200):**
```json
{
  "error": null,
  "message": "Pesanan berhasil dihapus",
  "data": {
    "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef",
    "shopId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
    "shop": {
      "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdee",
      "name": "Jakarta Main Store"
    },
    "status": "PENDING",
    "totalAmount": 45000,
    "orderItems": [
      {
        "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf0",
        "productId": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
        "product": {
          "id": "01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdf1",
          "name": "Organic Rice",
          "price": 15000
        },
        "quantity": 3,
        "price": 15000
      }
    ],
    "createdAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z",
    "updatedAt": "2024-01-15T10:00:00.000Z"
  }
}
```

**Possible Errors:** 400, 401, 403, 404, 500

response.name: Success 200
Error 400 Cannot Delete Completed
